summary: This document is a summary of account activity for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the month of October 2016. It details the account balance, transactions including deposits, checks paid, and service charges, as well as the ending balance at the end of the month.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder whose financial transactions are detailed in this document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document summarizes account activity for Jeffrey Epstein's Deutsche Bank account for October 2016.
The beginning balance on October 1, 2016, was $141,231.53.
The ending balance on October 31, 2016, was $53,600.50.
Multiple transactions include significant debits for health insurance premiums and payroll fees.
There are no overdraft fees recorded for this statement period.
